item.title: My golang modules live in Athens
item.description: So I’ve been on the fence with the vendor directory. On one hand, it’s great to have the modules in the project because it speeds up the build and serves as a safe storage. On the other hand, it does increase the churn in the repository and creates a lot of duplication on disk because many projects often contain the same dependencies. Since I do like holding on to my dependencies and go mod works great for me, I’ve decided to try out The Athens.
